material: Site breaking-cnn.com tries to mimic CNN, it is known to publish celebrity death hoaxes. The easiest way to see whether a news is fake or not is: 1) look at the link, if it tries to mimic major news site then it’s likely a fake, 2) if you are not familiar about it, don’t believe it right away
comment: Wohoo! We helped our followers to dodge the fake news! You got 4 points!
response: You are right about this post! I almost believed it. Thanks!
